Entries.Fri4: Hey, @. I'm glad you stopped by.#e#I'm having myself a nice drink in honor of my Grandma. She was really great, wasn't she?#$e#Now Grandpa, on the other hand...#$e#Just kidding.$h
Entries.fall_Mon: My Grandma always told me I should spend more time studying.#$e#I was like, '...Grams, don't fret. I'm turning pro!'$h#$e#Studying is for nerds, anyway.
Entries.fall_Mon4: My Grandma always told me I should spend more time studying.#$e#Maybe she was right...$s

Entries.summer_16.001: Yeah, yeah... I'm good. Just tape it up, okay?
Yeah, yeah... I'm good, Mag. Just tape it up, okay?

Entries.marriage_Mon.000: I'm going to hang out here all day. Not like I have much else to do...

Entries.funReturn_Alex: I had a good day. I like to go see Granny whenever I can... someone's gotta keep her company, y'know?
Entries.fall_26: I hope Granny is doing okay.#$b#She probably is; unlike Grandpa, she actually turns on the furnace when it gets cold.$h

Entries.funReturn_Alex: I had a good day. I like to go see Grandpa whenever I can... someone's gotta keep him company, y'know?
Entries.fall_26: I hope Grandpa is doing okay. he's too cheap to turn on the furnace until the last minute.

Entries.funReturn_Alex: I had a good day. I like to go visit that old house whenever I can...#$b#It doesn't feel right to leave it without anyone living in it, y'know?
Entries.fall_26: I hope my old house is doing okay.#$b#I know it's kind of silly to worry about the feelings of a building, but it's an important place to me.
